name: Adobe Acrobat Reader越界读取漏洞（CNVD-2025-13315）
product: ["Adobe Acrobat 2024 <=24.001.30235", "Adobe Acrobat 2020 <=20.005.30763", "Adobe Acrobat Reader 2020 <=20.005.30763", "Adobe Acrobat DC <=25.001.20521", "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC <=25.001.20521"]
description: Adobe Acrobat Reader是美国奥多比（Adobe）公司的一款PDF查看器。该软件用于打印，签名和注释PDF。Adobe Acrobat Reader存在越界读取漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/acrobat/apsb25-57.html
patch: Adobe Acrobat Reader越界读取漏洞（CNVD-2025-13315）的补丁
